short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy a clear clock, date, and customizable greeting. Access popular websites like YouTube, GitHub, and more with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Time Extension: Your Essential Browser Companion
Elevate your browsing experience with Time Extension, a sleek and minimalist extension that offers more than just time. Enjoy a large, easy-to-read clock, the current date, and a customizable greeting message.
Plus, discover your favorite websites with ease:

YouTube: Dive into the world of videos with a single click.
GitHub: Explore and contribute to open-source projects.
X: Connect with friends and stay updated on the latest trends.
LinkedIn: Network with professionals and find new opportunities.
Reddit: Join communities and discuss topics that interest you.
Stack Overflow: Get answers to your coding questions from experts.
Time Extension is your one-stop shop for time, convenience, and community.
